hours_text:

## Hours

  * [Hours](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106180632/https://www.mightyeighth.org/hours/)
  * [Ticket Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106180632/https://www.mightyeighth.org/ticket-info/)
  * [Chapel of the Fallen Eagles](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106180632/https://www.mightyeighth.org/chapel/)
  * [Group Tours](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106180632/https://www.mightyeighth.org/group-tours/)
  * [Memorial Garden](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106180632/https://www.mightyeighth.org/memorial-garden-2/)
  * [The Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106180632/https://www.mightyeighth.org/the-mighty-eighth-museum/)
  * [Venue Rentals](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106180632/https://www.mightyeighth.org/event/)

### Museum Hours of Operation

**Monday**  
| _Closed_  

**Tuesday – Saturday**  
|  _10 am – 5 pm_  

**Sunday**  
|  _Noon – 5 pm_  

The National Museum of the Mighty Eighth Air Force is closed on New Year’s Day, Easter, Thanksgiving, Christmas Day.

### Roger A. Freeman Research Center Hours of Operation  

**Monday**  
| _Closed_  
  
| **Tuesday – Saturday**  
|  _10 am – Noon & 1 pm – 3 pm_  

**Friday**  
|  _10 am – Noon_  

**Saturday & ****Sunday**  
|  _Closed_  

### Museum Gift Store Hours of Operation

The Museum Gift Store is open 24 hours a day online at[ www.shop.mightyeighth.org ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260106180632/...
